title: Rockstar Focusing on GTA 6 - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.05.22
description:
Rockstar is shelving projects to focus on Grand Theft Auto 6! Plus, Greg, Gary, SnowBikeMike, and Barrett DIG INTO all the Ubisoft news! Assassin's Creed Rift, Skull and Bones, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:08:00 - Housekeeping
Merch of the Month - The Tropical Collection - is live today! Designed by Nick at Campfire Design Studio: kindafunny.com/store
Porty hats will be restocked next Friday 7/15
Outriders Worldslayer youtube.com/kindafunnyplays
The Roper Report  -
00:10:16 - Skull and Bones Thursday, Multi-Game Showcase in September, Youssef Maguid
00:19:55 - What can the rumored Assassin's Creed "Rift" do to get you excited to hop back in the franchise? - Best Friends Q:JakeBakesCakes
00:32:35 - Speaking of ubi, They’re shutting some stuff down, Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:33:25 - Michael Jordan comes to NBA 2K23,By Eddie Makuch @gamespot
00:46:28 - Ad
00:48:08 - Rockstar Shelving Remakes to Focus on GTA 6, Zack Zwiezen @ Kotaku
00:55:15 - Lollipop Chainsaw Remake in 2023, Yoshimi Yasuda, Lollipop Chainsaw Producer
00:58:00 - Xbox 360 games will no longer be part of Xbox Games with Gold in October, Tom Warren @ The Verge
01:00:20 - Inscription is rated for PS4 in AU
01:00:40 - Good news: Guardians Writer Joins Mass Effect
01:02:10 - Out today
01:06:20 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Janet and Jared
